analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas na /
translated: Lord, if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, unskilled in means, stand in the knowledge of all aspects with a thought that stands in ‘I’ and ‘mine,’

original: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
translated: They practice for the sake of the knowledge of all aspects,🔽but they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na / mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
translated: And why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
translated: Because bodhisattva great beings who practice for the sake of something will not master the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: will not be absorbed in the yoga of the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and without completing the perfection of wisdom will not emerge into the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir @13b bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis de bzhin nyid la gnas na /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir @13b bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis de bzhin nyid la gnas na /
translated: If, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they, unskilled in means, with a mind that is settled in the idea of an ‘I’ and the idea of a ‘mine,’ stand in suchness,

original: de de bzhin nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
analyzed: de de bzhin nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
translated: they practice the performance of suchness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Because bodhisattva great beings who practice the performance of suchness🔽do not master the perfection of wisdom.🔽They do not enter into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Without mastering the perfection of wisdom, without entering into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom, without completing the perfection of wisdom, they will not emerge into the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gnas na /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gnas na /

analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas na /

analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na; mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
translated: If you ask why, it is because bodhisattva great beings who practice in order to actualize do not master the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas na /

analyzed: de yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs ni /

analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

analyzed: gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags / tshor ba ni /

analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

analyzed: tshor ba'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du tshor ba ma lags / 'du shes ni /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

original: 'du byed kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du 'du byed ma lags /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du 'du byed ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehending of volition is also not volition, because it is empty of inherent nature.

original: rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: Consciousness is nonapprehending.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehending of consciousness is also not consciousness, because it is empty of inherent nature.

original: mig ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste //
analyzed: mig ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste //
translated: The eyes are nonapprehending.

original: @16a *// mig gi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mig ma lags /🔽rna ba ni /
analyzed: @16a *// mig gi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mig ma lags / rna ba ni /
translated: That nonapprehending of the eye is not the eye because of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The ear is nonapprehending.

original: rna ba'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rna ba ma lags /
analyzed: rna ba'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rna ba ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehending of the ear is not the ear because of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: sna ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: sna ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The nose is nonapprehending.

original: sna'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sna ma lags /
analyzed: sna'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sna ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehending of the nose is not the nose because of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: lce ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: lce ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The tongue is nonapprehending.

original: lce'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lce ma lags /
analyzed: lce'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lce ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehending of the tongue is not the tongue because of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: lus ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: lus ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The body is nonapprehending.

original: lus kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lus ma lags /
analyzed: lus kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lus ma lags /
translated: The absence of appropriation of the body is not the body because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yid ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yid ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The mind is not appropriated.

original: yid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yid ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yid ma lags /
translated: The absence of appropriation of the mind is not the mind because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽Form is not appropriated.

original: gzugs ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags /
translated: The absence of appropriation of form is not form because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: sgra ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: sgra ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Sound is not appropriated.

original: sgra'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sgra ma lags /
analyzed: sgra'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sgra ma lags /
translated: The absence of appropriation of sound is not sound because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: dri ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: dri ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Smell is not appropriated.

original: dri'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa @16b de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dri ma lags /🔽ro ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: dri'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa @16b de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dri ma lags / ro ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: smell is not a smell because the nonapprehending of smell is empty by nature;

original: ro'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du ro ma lags /🔽reg ni; yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: ro'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du ro ma lags / reg ni; yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: taste is not a taste because the nonapprehending of taste is empty by nature;

original: reg gi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du reg ma lags /
analyzed: reg gi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du reg ma lags /
translated: touch is not a touch because the nonapprehending of touch is empty by nature;

original: chos ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; chos kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos ma lags /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: chos ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; chos kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos ma lags / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: phenomena are not phenomena because the nonapprehending of phenomena is empty by nature.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: “Eye consciousness is not eye consciousness because the nonapprehending of eye consciousness is empty by nature;

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags /🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: That nonapprehending of eye consciousness is also not eye consciousness because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Ear consciousness is nonapprehending.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma lags /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma lags / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: That nonapprehending of ear consciousness is also not ear consciousness because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Nose consciousness is nonapprehending.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa ma lags /🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa ma lags / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: That nonapprehending of nose consciousness is also not nose consciousness because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Tongue consciousness is nonapprehending.🔽That nonapprehending of tongue consciousness is also not tongue consciousness because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lce'i rnam par @17a *//🔽shes pa ma lags /🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lce'i rnam par @17a *// shes pa ma lags / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: That nonapprehending of tongue consciousness is also not tongue consciousness because of the emptiness of its own intrinsic nature.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni /

translated: That nonapprehending of body consciousness is also not body consciousness because of the emptiness of its own intrinsic nature.🔽That nonapprehending of mind consciousness is also not mind consciousness because of the emptiness of its own intrinsic nature.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: That nonapprehending of eye contact is also not eye contact because of the emptiness of its own intrinsic nature.🔽That nonapprehending of ear contact is also not ear contact because of the emptiness of its own intrinsic nature.🔽That nonapprehending of nose contact is also not nose contact because of the emptiness of its own intrinsic nature.

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the body is

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: not apprehended.🔽That which is the nonapprehension of the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the body is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the body, because it is empty of inherent existence.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the mind is🔽not apprehended.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /

translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the body is not contact through the coming together of the body because the condition of contact through the coming together of the body is not something that can be appropriated and is empty of inherent nature.🔽The condition of contact through the coming together of the mind is not contact through the coming together of the mind because the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind is not something that can be appropriated and is empty of inherent nature.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the mind is not something that can be appropriated.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /🔽sa'i khams ni /

translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the mind is not contact through the coming together of the mind because the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind is not something that can be appropriated and is empty of inherent nature.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The earth element is not something that can be appropriated.

original: sa'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa'i de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sa'i khams ma lags /🔽chu'i khams ni /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa'i de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sa'i khams ma lags / chu'i khams ni /
translated: The earth element is not the earth element because the earth element is not something that can be appropriated and is empty of inherent nature.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The water element is not something that can be appropriated.

original: chu'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chu'i khams ma lags /🔽me'i khams ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chu'i khams ma lags / me'i khams ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The element of water is not apprehended because the nonapprehension of the element of water is empty of the nonapprehension of the element of water by way of its own essential nature.

original: me'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du me'i khams ma lags /🔽rlung gi khams ni yongs su bzung @18b ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du me'i khams ma lags / rlung gi khams ni yongs su bzung @18b ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The element of fire is not apprehended because the nonapprehension of the element of fire is empty of the nonapprehension of the element of fire by way of its own essential nature.

original: rlung gi khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rlung gi khams ma lags /🔽nam mkha'i khams ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rlung gi khams ma lags / nam mkha'i khams ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The element of wind is not apprehended because the nonapprehension of the element of wind is empty of the nonapprehension of the element of wind by way of its own essential nature.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du nam mkha'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du nam mkha'i khams ma lags /
translated: The element of space is not apprehended because the nonapprehension of the element of space is empty of the nonapprehension of the element of space by way of its own essential nature.🔽The element of consciousness is not apprehended because the nonapprehension of the element of consciousness is empty of the nonapprehension of the element of consciousness by way of its own essential nature.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The consciousness element is ungraspable.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags /🔽ma rig pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags / ma rig pa ni /
translated: That ungraspability of the consciousness element is also not the consciousness element because of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Ignorance is ungraspable.

original: ma rig pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du ma rig pa ma lags /🔽'du byed ni /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du ma rig pa ma lags / 'du byed ni /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags / nang stong pa nyid @20a *// ni; yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste / nang stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid ma lags / phyi stong pa nyid ni /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: “The emptiness of internal phenomena is not the emptiness of internal phenomena because of the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽and the emptiness of external phenomena is not the emptiness of external phenomena because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

translated: That nonapprehending of external emptiness is also not external emptiness because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni /
translated: “The emptiness of internal and external is

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma lags; chen po stong pa nyid ni /
translated: “The emptiness of great extent is

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: nonapprehending.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the great is not the emptiness of the great because the emptiness of the great is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is not the emptiness of the ultimate because the emptiness of the ultimate is not apprehended.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is not the emptiness of the conditioned because the emptiness of the conditioned is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is not the emptiness of the unconditioned because the emptiness of the unconditioned is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not the emptiness of what is beyond extremes because what is beyond extremes is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not the emptiness of the beginningless and endless because the beginningless and endless are not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of nature is not the emptiness of nature because a nature is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena because all phenomena are not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of specific characteristics is not the emptiness of specific characteristics because specific characteristics are not apprehended.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of nonobservation is not the emptiness of nonobservation because nonobservation is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of the nonexistence of things is not the emptiness of the nonexistence of things because the nonexistence of things is not apprehended.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid ma lags /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid ma lags / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature because an essential nature is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of all things is not the emptiness of all things because all things are not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of nonthings is not the emptiness of nonthings because nonthings are not apprehended.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin @20b gyis stong pa'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin @20b gyis stong pa'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics because intrinsic defining characteristics are not apprehended.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of nonthings is not the emptiness of nonthings because nonthings are not apprehended.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehension of the emptiness of the compounded is not the emptiness of the compounded, because the emptiness of the compounded is empty of the emptiness of the compounded.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the extreme is

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: nonapprehension.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehension of the emptiness of the extreme is not the emptiness of the extreme, because the emptiness of the extreme is empty of the emptiness of the extreme.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is🔽nonapprehension.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: That nonapprehension of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, because the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is empty of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni; yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of nonrejection is not apprehended.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma lags /🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma lags / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is not apprehended.🔽The nonapprehension of the emptiness of inherent existence is the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma lags; chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du @21a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma lags; chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du @21a *//
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not apprehended.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The nonapprehension of the emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not appropriated.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The non-appropriation of the emptiness of defining characteristics is also not the emptiness of defining characteristics because of its emptiness of its own inherent nature.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of non-observation

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not appropriated.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The non-appropriation of the emptiness of non-observation is also not the emptiness of non-observation because of its emptiness of its own inherent nature.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of non-things

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not appropriated.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The non-appropriation of the emptiness of non-things is also not the emptiness of non-things because of its emptiness of its own inherent nature.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is also not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni /
translated: The applications of mindfulness

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: are not apprehended.

original: dran pa nye bar @21b gzhag pa rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar @21b gzhag pa rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags /
translated: The four applications of mindfulness are not the four applications of mindfulness because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The four right efforts are not the four right efforts because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The four legs of miraculous power are not the four legs of miraculous power because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The five faculties are not the five faculties because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The five powers are not the five powers because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de 'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de 'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The seven aspects of enlightenment are not the seven aspects of enlightenment because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The three gateways to liberation are not the three gateways to liberation because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags /🔽dbang po rnams ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags / dbang po rnams ni /
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are not the ten powers of the tathāgatas because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The four fearlessnesses are not the four fearlessnesses because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges are not the four detailed and thorough knowledges because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: dbang po rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dbang po rnams ma lags /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dbang po rnams ma lags /
translated: The faculties are not the faculties because of the emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the faculties.

original: stobs rnams ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: stobs rnams ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The powers are not the powers because of the emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the powers.🔽The aspects of the path are not the aspects of the path because of the emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the aspects of the path.🔽The thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment are not the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment because of the emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the emptiness of inherent existence is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the signless is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.

original: stobs rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du stobs rnams ma lags /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du stobs rnams ma lags / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the wishless is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the four noble truths is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the four formless meditative absorptions is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the four concentrations is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the four immeasurables is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the four formless meditative absorptions is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the five clairvoyances is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the five powers is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the five faculties is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the seven aspects of enlightenment is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad @22a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad @22a *//
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the noble eightfold path is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the nonapprehending of the four noble truths is the emptiness of the nonapprehending.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence of the

original: pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags /
analyzed: pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags /
translated: That non-appropriation of the noble eightfold path is also not the noble eightfold path because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags /

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du bsam gtan rnams ma lags / tshad med pa rnams ni /

translated: The nonapprehending of the formless absorptions is also not the formless absorptions because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The nonapprehending of the eight liberations is also not the eight liberations because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of the nine serial absorptions is also not the nine serial absorptions because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of the ten totalities is also not the ten totalities because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of the aspects of the path is also not the aspects of the path because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of the ten powers is also not the ten powers because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of the four fearlessnesses is also not the four fearlessnesses because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is also not the four detailed and thorough knowledges because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is also not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of a knower of paths is also not a knower of paths because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of a knower of bases is also not a knower of bases because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

translated: The nonapprehending of a knower of paths is also not a knower of paths because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of a knower of bases is also not a knower of bases because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of a knower of bases is also not a knower of bases because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of a knower of paths is also not a knower of paths because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

translated: The nonapprehending of a knower of bases is also not a knower of bases because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of a knower of paths is also not a knower of paths because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The nonapprehending of a know

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma lags /
translated: The nine serial absorptions are not the serial absorptions because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates of liberation

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
translated: are ungraspable.

analyzed: pa med pa ma lags /
translated: The ungraspability of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates of liberation is not the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates of liberation because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

translated: The higher knowledges are not the higher knowledges because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams ma lags / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The meditative stabilizations are not the meditative stabilizations because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not the dhāraṇī gateways because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni /
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are not the ten powers of the tathāgatas because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The four fearlessnesses are not the four fearlessnesses because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges are not the four detailed and thorough knowledges because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The path of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening is not the path of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The ten tathāgata powers are not the ten tathāgata powers because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags @23a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags @23a *//
translated: The four fearlessnesses are not the four fearlessnesses because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges are not the four detailed and thorough knowledges because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The path of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening is not the path of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lags /
analyzed: pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lags /
translated: Because of being empty of inherent nature, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not the ten powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni /

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: are not apprehended.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma lags /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma lags /
translated: Because of being empty of inherent nature, the nonapprehension of the four fearlessnesses is not the four fearlessnesses.

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma lags /
translated: Because of being empty of inherent nature, the nonapprehension of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is not the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

analyzed: snying rje chen po ni /
translated: Great compassion

analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

analyzed: snying rje chen po'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du snying rje chen po ma lags /

analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma lags /
translated: The nonapprehension of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha is also not the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha, because it is empty of essence.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni /
translated: The result of stream-enterer

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not apprehended.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma lags /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma lags /
translated: The nonapprehension of the result of stream-enterer is also not the result of stream-enterer, because it is empty of essence.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni /
translated: The result of once-returner

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not apprehended.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i @23b yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i @23b yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags /
translated: The result of being a once-returner is not a result of being a once-returner because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni /
translated: The result of being a non-returner

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags /
translated: is not a result of being a non-returner because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The state of a worthy one

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid ma lags /
translated: is not the state of a worthy one because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang byang chub ni /
analyzed: rang byang chub ni /
translated: A pratyekabuddha’s awakening

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not a pratyekabuddha’s awakening because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang byang chub kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rang byang chub ma lags /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rang byang chub ma lags /
translated: Because the emptiness of inherent existence is not a pratyekabuddha.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of path aspects

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma lags /
translated: is not a knowledge of path aspects because the emptiness of inherent existence is not a knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni /🔽yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags /
translated: is not the knowledge of all aspects because the emptiness of inherent existence is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: Suchness

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not suchness because the emptiness of inherent existence is not suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin @24a *//
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin @24a *//
translated: The unapprehended nature of suchness is also🔽

original: gyis stong pa'i slad du de bzhin nyid ma lags /
analyzed: gyis stong pa'i slad du de bzhin nyid ma lags /
translated: That which is not apprehended as suchness is also not suchness because of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: Unmistaken suchness

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not apprehended.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa da'ang  rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma lags /
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa da'ang  rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma lags /
translated: That which is not apprehended as unmistaken suchness is also not unmistaken suchness because of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: Unaltered suchness

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not apprehended.

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma lags /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma lags /
translated: That which is not apprehended as unaltered suchness is also not unaltered suchness because of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: chos nyid ni /
analyzed: chos nyid ni /
translated: The true nature of dharmas

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not apprehended.

original: chos nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos nyid ma lags /
analyzed: chos nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos nyid ma lags /
translated: That which is not apprehended as the real nature is not the real nature because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The expanse of reality🔽is not apprehended.🔽That which is not apprehended as the expanse of reality is not the expanse of reality because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos kyi dbyings ni /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni /
translated: The establishment of phenomena

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not apprehended.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: That which is not apprehended as the establishment of phenomena is not the establishment of phenomena because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos kyi gnas nyid ni /
analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid ni /
translated: The true nature of phenomena

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: is not apprehended.

original: chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos kyi gnas nyid ma lags /🔽chos skyon med pa nyid ni /
analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos kyi gnas nyid ma lags /🔽chos skyon med pa nyid ni /
translated: That which is not apprehended as the true nature of phenomena is not the true nature of phenomena because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; chos skyon med pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste; chos skyon med pa nyid kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The absence of appropriation of the dharmas’ flawlessness is also not the dharmas’ flawlessness because it is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni /🔽yongs su @24b bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni / yongs su @24b bzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: The very limit of reality🔽is also not the very limit of reality because it is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te /
translated: The absence of appropriation of the very limit of reality is also not the very limit of reality because it is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so ////
translated: That perfection of wisdom is also not appropriated because it is empty of an intrinsic nature.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyi shu rtsa drug pa /
analyzed: bam po nyi shu rtsa drug pa /
translated: Fascicle Twenty-Six

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should investigate all phenomena in this way as emptiness by nature.

original: ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o //
translated: They should investigate in such a way that their minds do not engage with any phenomenon.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste /
translated: this is the bodhisattva great beings’ maṇḍala of meditative absorption called ‘not apprehending any phenomena.’

original: rgya che ba phul du bgyi ba tshad ma mchis pa /
analyzed: rgya che ba phul du bgyi ba tshad ma mchis pa /
translated: It is vast, sublime, and immeasurable.

original: tshad ma mchis par nges pa /
analyzed: tshad ma mchis par nges pa /
translated: It is certain to be immeasurable.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrog pa /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrog pa /
translated: It cannot be taken away by any hearers or solitary buddhas.

original: de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa ste /
analyzed: de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa ste /
translated: It is not shared with them.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who practice this maṇḍala of meditative absorption

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: That knowledge of all aspects is inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid @25a *//
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid @25a *//
translated: the emptiness of the compounded,

original: dang; 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dang; 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,🔽and the emptiness of intrinsic identity.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: “Why is that, Bhagavān?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste /
translated: in that way, the knowledge of all aspects is not described by means of a causal sign.

original: de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste /
translated: Because, in that way, the causal signs give rise to afflictions.

original: mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are those causal signs?

original: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //🔽tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o // tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Form is a causal sign.🔽Feeling is a causal sign.

original: 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Perception is a causal sign.

original: 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Formations are causal signs.

original: rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //🔽mig ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o // mig ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Consciousness is a causal sign.🔽The eyes are causal signs.

original: rna ba ni mtshan ma'o //🔽sna ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba ni mtshan ma'o // sna ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The ears are causal signs.🔽The nose is a causal sign.

original: lce ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: lce ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The tongue is a causal sign.

original: lus ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: lus ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The body is a causal sign.

original: yid ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: yid ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The mind is a sign.

original: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Form is a sign.

original: sgra ni mtshan ma'o //🔽dri ni mtshan ma'o //🔽ro ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sgra ni mtshan ma'o // dri ni mtshan ma'o // ro ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Sound is a sign.🔽Smell is a sign.🔽Taste is a sign.

original: reg ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: reg ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Touch is a sign.

original: chos ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: chos ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Mental phenomena are a sign.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Eye consciousness is a sign.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Ear consciousness is a sign.🔽Nose consciousness is a sign.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Tongue consciousness is a sign.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Body consciousness is a sign.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //🔽@25b mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o // @25b mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Mind consciousness is a sign.🔽Eye contact is a sign.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Ear contact is a sign.🔽Nose contact is a sign.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Tongue contact is a sign.🔽Body contact is a sign.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Mind contact is a sign.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of eye, form, and consciousness is a sign.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of ear, sound, and consciousness is a sign.🔽The feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and consciousness is a sign.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of tongue, taste, and consciousness is a sign.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of body, touch, and consciousness is a sign.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of mind, phenomena, and consciousness is a sign.

original: sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The earth element is a sign.

original: chu'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The water element is a sign.

original: me'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //🔽rlung gi khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: me'i khams ni mtshan ma'o // rlung gi khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The fire element is a sign.🔽The wind element is a sign.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The space element is a sign.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The consciousness element is a sign.

original: ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Ignorance is a sign.

original: 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Formation is a sign.

original: rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Consciousness is a sign.

original: ming dang gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Name and form are a sign.

original: skye mched drug ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The six sense fields are a sign.

original: reg pa ni mtshan ma'o; ;tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: reg pa ni mtshan ma'o; ;tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Contact is a sign. Sensation is a sign.

original: sred pa ni mtshan ma'o //🔽len pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sred pa ni mtshan ma'o // len pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Craving is a sign.🔽Clinging is a sign.

original: srid pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: srid pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Becoming is a sign.

original: skye ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Birth is a sign.

original: rga shi ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rga shi ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Aging and death is a sign.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline is a sign.🔽The perfection of patience is a sign.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan @26a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan @26a *//

analyzed: mtshan ma'o // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni /

analyzed: mtshan ma'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni; mtshan ma'o //
translated: are signs.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni /
translated: The four fearlessnesses🔽are signs.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges

analyzed: mtshan ma'o // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni /
translated: are signs.🔽Great love

original: mtshan ma'o // byams pa chen po ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma'o // byams pa chen po ni /
translated: is a sign.🔽Great compassion

analyzed: mtshan ma'o // snying rje chen po ni /
translated: is a sign.

analyzed: mtshan ma'o // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha🔽are signs.

original: mtshan ma'o // yi ge rnams ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma'o // yi ge rnams ni /
translated: The letters🔽are signs.

analyzed: mtshan ma'o // gcig tu brjod pa ni /
