analyzed: mtshan ma'o // gnyis su brjod pa ni / mtshan ma'o // tha dad du brjod pa ni /
translated: The dual expression🔽is a sign.🔽The distinct expression

original: mtshan ma ste; de ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma ste; de ni /
translated: is a sign.🔽That

original: nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o //
translated: is called an affliction.

original: gal te de mtshan mar bzung ba zhig lags na ni /
analyzed: gal te de mtshan mar bzung ba zhig lags na ni /
translated: If it were to be apprehended as a sign,

original: kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even the wandering mendicant Maṇi-dhvaja will not attain faith in this wisdom of omniscience.

original: dad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dad pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is faith?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste /
translated: confidence in the perfection of wisdom, understanding, belief, reliance, thought, evaluation, and examination.

original: de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags /
analyzed: de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags /
translated: Moreover, it is not in the manner of signs,

original: mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du'ang ma lags so //
analyzed: mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du'ang ma lags so //
translated: nor is it in the manner of signlessness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: de ni / mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pas bzung ba lags te /🔽kun tu rgyu @27a *//
analyzed: de ni / mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pas bzung ba lags te / kun tu rgyu @27a *//
translated: it is grasped by not grasping signs and signlessness.

original: ba phreng ba can des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te /
analyzed: ba phreng ba can des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te /
translated: The wandering mendicant Maṇi-dhvaja, having gained belief in this wisdom of omniscience, will enter through the limited wisdom of one who follows by faith.

original: de ltar zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de ltar zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
translated: Having entered thus, he will not grasp form,

original: tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He does not grasp feelings.

original: 'du shes yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'du shes yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He does not grasp perceptions.

original: 'du byed yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He does not grasp volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: He does not grasp consciousness.

original: de ni / 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa ma dmigs te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa ma dmigs te /
translated: Because he does not apprehend any dharma that he would grasp or not grasp, since all dharmas are empty of their own marks.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: Because he does not see that wisdom internally, in the manner of realizing and attaining it.🔽He does not see that wisdom externally, in the manner of realizing and attaining it.

original: ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom internally and externally, in the manner of realizing and attaining it.

original: ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis de las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis de las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that wisdom apart from that, in the manner of realizing and attaining it.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: It is because he does not see any dharma by which he might realize, by which he might realize it, or which he might realize.

original: des ye shes de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom in form.

original: ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom outside of form.🔽He does not see that wisdom inside and outside of form.

original: ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du'ang @27b yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du'ang @27b yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as anything other than form.🔽He does not see that wisdom in feeling.🔽He does not see that wisdom outside of feeling.

original: ye shes de tshor ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshor ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom inside and outside of feeling.

original: ye shes de tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de 'du shes kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de 'du shes kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as anything other than a sensation.🔽He does not see that pristine cognition as existing internally.

original: ye shes de 'du shes kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de 'du shes kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de 'du shes kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de 'du shes kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as existing externally.🔽He does not see that pristine cognition as existing both internally and externally.

original: ye shes de 'du shes ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de 'du shes ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as anything other than a sensation.

original: des ye shes de 'du byed kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de 'du byed kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de 'du byed kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de 'du byed kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de 'du byed kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de 'du byed kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as existing internally.🔽He does not see that pristine cognition as existing externally.🔽He does not see that pristine cognition as existing both internally and externally.

original: ye shes de 'du byed ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de 'du byed ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as anything other than a formation.

original: des ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the inner aspect of consciousness.

original: ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the outer aspect of consciousness.🔽They do not see that wisdom as the inner and outer aspect of consciousness.

original: ye shes de rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de mig gi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de mig gi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as anything other than consciousness.🔽They do not see that wisdom as the inner aspect of the eyes.

original: ye shes de mig gi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de mig gi @28a *//
analyzed: ye shes de mig gi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de mig gi @28a *//
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the outer aspect of the eyes.

original: phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the inner and outer aspect of the eyes.

original: ye shes de mig ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de mig ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as anything other than the eyes.

original: des ye shes de rna ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de rna ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the inner aspect of the ears.

original: ye shes de rna ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rna ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rna ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rna ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom externally.🔽He does not see that wisdom internally and externally.

original: ye shes de rna ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de sna'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de sna'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de sna'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rna ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de sna'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de sna'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de sna'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the ears.🔽“He does not see that wisdom internally.🔽He does not see that wisdom externally.🔽He does not see that wisdom internally and externally.

original: ye shes de sna ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de lce'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de lce'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sna ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de lce'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de lce'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the nose.🔽“He does not see that wisdom internally.🔽He does not see that wisdom externally.

analyzed: ye shes de lce'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /

analyzed: ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /

analyzed: ye shes de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being inside the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose.

original: ye shes de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su @31a *//
analyzed: ye shes de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su @31a *//
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose.

original: ma mthong / ye shes de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ma mthong / ye shes de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that pristine consciousness as the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the nose, either internally or externally.

original: ye shes de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that pristine consciousness as anything other than the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the nose.🔽“He does not see that pristine consciousness internally in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the tongue.🔽He does not see that pristine consciousness externally in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the tongue.🔽He does not see that pristine consciousness internally and externally in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the tongue.

original: ye shes de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that pristine consciousness as anything other than the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the tongue.

original: des ye shes de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being inside the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the body.

original: ye shes de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the body.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being inside and outside the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the body.

original: ye shes de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the body.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being inside the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the mind.

original: ye shes de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the mind.

original: ye shes de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi @31b nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i phyi @31b nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the mental faculty, and so on up to:

original: ye shes de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de sa'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de sa'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: he does not see that wisdom as anything other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of the mental faculty.🔽“He does not see that wisdom as being inside the earth element,

original: ye shes de sa'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de sa'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sa'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de sa'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: he does not see that wisdom as being outside the earth element,🔽he does not see that wisdom as being both inside and outside the earth element,

original: ye shes de sa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de chu'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de chu'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and he does not see that wisdom as being other than the earth element.🔽“He does not see that wisdom as being inside the water element,

original: ye shes de chu'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chu'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: he does not see that wisdom as being outside the water element,

original: ye shes de chu'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chu'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider wisdom to be inside or outside the water element.

original: ye shes de chu'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de me'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chu'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de me'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider wisdom to be other than the water element.🔽“He does not consider wisdom to be inside the fire element.

original: ye shes de me'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de me'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de me'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de me'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider wisdom to be outside the fire element.🔽He does not consider wisdom to be inside and outside the fire element.

original: ye shes de me'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de rlung gi khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rlung gi khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de me'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rlung gi khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rlung gi khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider wisdom to be other than the fire element.🔽“He does not consider wisdom to be inside the wind element.🔽He does not consider wisdom to be outside the wind element.

original: ye shes de rlung gi khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rlung gi khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider wisdom to be inside and outside the wind element.

original: ye shes de rlung gi khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des @32a *// ye shes de nam mkha'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rlung gi khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des @32a *// ye shes de nam mkha'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the element of wind.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being within the element of space.

original: ye shes de nam mkha'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de nam mkha'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de nam mkha'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de nam mkha'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being outside the element of space.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside the element of space.

original: ye shes de nam mkha'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de rnam bar shes pa'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de nam mkha'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rnam bar shes pa'i khams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the element of space.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being within the element of consciousness.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being outside the element of consciousness.

original: ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside the element of consciousness.

original: ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de ma rig pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de ma rig pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the element of consciousness.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being within ignorance.

original: ye shes de ma rig pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de ma rig pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de ma rig pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de ma rig pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being outside of ignorance.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside of ignorance.

original: ye shes de ma rig pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de ma rig pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being anything other than not ignorance.

original: des ye shes de 'du byed kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de 'du byed kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de 'du byed kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de 'du byed kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de 'du byed kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de 'du byed kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being within formative predispositions.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being outside of formative predispositions.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside of formative predispositions.

original: ye shes de 'du byed ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de 'du byed ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being anything other than not formative predispositions.

original: des @32b ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des @32b ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being within consciousness.

original: ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside of consciousness.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being both inside and outside of consciousness.

original: ye shes de rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than consciousness.

original: des ye shes de ming dang gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de ming dang gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being within name and form.

original: ye shes de ming dang gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de ming dang gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de ming dang gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de ming dang gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside of name and form.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being both inside and outside of name and form.

original: ye shes de ming dang gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de ming dang gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than name and form.

original: des ye shes de skye mched drug gi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de skye mched drug gi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being inside the six sense fields.

original: ye shes de skye mched drug gi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de skye mched drug gi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de skye mched drug gi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de skye mched drug gi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being outside the six sense fields.🔽He does not see that wisdom as being inside and outside the six sense fields.

original: ye shes de skye mched drug ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de reg pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de skye mched drug ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de reg pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being other than the six sense fields.🔽“He does not see that wisdom as being inside contact.

original: ye shes de reg pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de reg pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de reg pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de reg pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being outside contact.🔽He does not see that wisdom as being inside and outside contact.

original: ye shes de reg pa lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de reg pa lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being other than contact.

original: des ye shes de tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de tshor ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “He does not see that wisdom as being inside sensation.

original: ye shes de tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshor ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as external to feeling.

original: ye shes de tshor ba'i phyi nang du @33a *//🔽yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshor ba'i phyi nang du @33a *// yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as internal and external to feeling.

original: ye shes de tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de sred pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de sred pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than feeling.🔽He does not see that wisdom as internal to craving.

original: ye shes de sred pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de sred pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sred pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de sred pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as external to craving.🔽He does not see that wisdom as internal and external to craving.

original: ye shes de sred pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de sred pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than craving.

original: des ye shes de len pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de len pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de len pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de len pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as internal to appropriation.🔽He does not see that wisdom as external to appropriation.

original: ye shes de len pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de len pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as internal and external to appropriation.

original: ye shes de len pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de len pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom anywhere else.

original: des ye shes de srid pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de srid pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de srid pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de srid pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom within existence.🔽I do not see that wisdom outside of existence.

original: ye shes de srid pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de srid pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom within and outside of existence.

original: ye shes de srid pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de skye ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de srid pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de skye ba'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom anywhere else apart from existence.🔽I do not see that wisdom within birth.

original: ye shes de skye ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de skye ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de skye ba'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de skye ba'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom outside of birth.🔽I do not see that wisdom within and outside of birth.

original: ye shes de skye ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de skye ba ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom anywhere else apart from birth.

original: des ye shes de rga shi'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de rga shi'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom within old age and death.

original: ye shes de rga @33b shi'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rga shi'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rga @33b shi'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rga shi'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider pristine consciousness to be external to aging and death.🔽He does not consider pristine consciousness to be internal and external to aging and death.

original: ye shes de rga shi ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rga shi ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider pristine consciousness to be other than aging and death.🔽“He does not consider pristine consciousness to be internal to the perfection of generosity.

original: ye shes de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider pristine consciousness to be external to the perfection of generosity.🔽He does not consider pristine consciousness to be internal and external to the perfection of generosity.

original: ye shes de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider pristine consciousness to be other than the perfection of generosity.

original: des ye shes de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “He does not consider pristine consciousness to be internal to the perfection of ethical discipline.

original: ye shes de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider pristine consciousness to be external to the perfection of morality.🔽He does not consider pristine consciousness to be internal and external to the perfection of morality.

original: ye shes de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider pristine consciousness to be other than the perfection of morality.🔽He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be internal to the perfection of patience.

original: ye shes de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider pristine consciousness to be external to the perfection of patience.🔽He does not consider pristine consciousness to be internal and external to the perfection of patience.

original: ye shes de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider pristine consciousness to be other than the perfection of patience.

original: des ye shes de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang @34a *//🔽dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang @34a *// dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider that wisdom to be within the perfection of perseverance,🔽nor does he consider that wisdom to be outside the perfection of perseverance.

original: ye shes de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider that wisdom to be inside and outside the perfection of perseverance,

original: ye shes de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong //🔽des ye shes de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // des ye shes de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: nor does he consider that wisdom to be other than the perfection of perseverance.🔽He does not consider that wisdom to be within the perfection of concentration,🔽nor does he consider that wisdom to be outside the perfection of concentration.

original: ye shes de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider that wisdom to be inside and outside the perfection of concentration,

original: ye shes de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the perfection of meditative stability.

original: des ye shes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being within the perfection of wisdom.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being outside the perfection of wisdom.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside the perfection of wisdom.

original: ye shes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de nang stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de nang stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the perfection of wisdom.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being within the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: ye shes de nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being outside the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: ye shes de nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as the inner and outer of inner emptiness.

original: ye shes de nang stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par @34b rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de phyi stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de nang stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par @34b rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de phyi stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as other than inner emptiness.🔽“That wisdom is not seen as the inner of outer emptiness.

original: ye shes de phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as the outer of outer emptiness.🔽That wisdom is not seen as the inner and outer of outer emptiness.

original: ye shes de phyi stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de phyi stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as other than outer emptiness.🔽“That wisdom is not seen as the inner of inner and outer emptiness.

original: ye shes de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as the outer of inner and outer emptiness.

original: ye shes de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as being internal or external in the emptiness of external and internal.

original: ye shes de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: That wisdom is not seen as being other than the emptiness of external and internal.

original: des ye shes de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “He does not see that wisdom as being internal to the emptiness of emptiness.

original: ye shes de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being external to the emptiness of emptiness.🔽He does not see that wisdom as being internal and external to the emptiness of emptiness.

original: ye shes de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being other than the emptiness of emptiness.

original: des ye shes de chen po stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de chen po stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “He does not see that wisdom as being internal to the emptiness of great emptiness.

original: ye shes de chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as the exterior of the emptiness of the great.🔽He does not see that pristine cognition as the interior of the emptiness of the great.

original: ye shes de chen po stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de chen po stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as other than the emptiness of the great.

original: des ye shes de don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽@35a *// ye shes de don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / @35a *// ye shes de don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as the interior of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽He does not see that pristine cognition as the exterior of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽He does not see that pristine cognition as the interior and exterior of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: ye shes de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as other than the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: des ye shes de 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that pristine cognition as the interior of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: ye shes de 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as external to the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: ye shes de 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as internal to the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: ye shes de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as other than the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽“That wisdom is not seen as internal to the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: ye shes de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as external to the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽That wisdom is not seen as internal and external to the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: ye shes de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: That wisdom is not seen as other than the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: des ye shes de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness that is the transcendence of extremes.

original: ye shes de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as external to the emptiness that is the transcendence of extremes.🔽They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness that is the transcendence of extremes both internally and externally.

original: ye shes de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽@35b des ye shes de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // @35b des ye shes de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness that is the transcendence of extremes in any other way.🔽“They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness of beginningless and endless.🔽They do not see that wisdom as external to the emptiness of beginningless and endless.

original: ye shes de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness of beginningless and endless both internally and externally.

original: ye shes de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as anything other than the emptiness that is neither diminished nor enhanced.🔽That wisdom is not seen as being internal to the emptiness that is neither diminished nor enhanced.

original: ye shes de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as being external to the emptiness that is neither diminished nor enhanced.🔽That wisdom is not seen as being both internal and external to the emptiness that is neither diminished nor enhanced.

original: ye shes de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as anything other than the emptiness that is neither diminished nor enhanced.🔽That wisdom is not seen as being internal to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: ye shes de rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as being external to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: ye shes de rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as being inside or outside the emptiness of nature.

original: ye shes de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: That wisdom is not seen as being other than the emptiness of nature.🔽“They do not see that wisdom as being inside the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: ye shes de chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being inside or outside the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: ye @36a *// shes de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye @36a *// shes de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: des ye shes de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “They do not see that wisdom as being inside the emptiness of its own characteristics.

original: ye shes de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as external to the emptiness of its very own mark.

original: ye shes de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as internal and external to the emptiness of its very own mark.

original: ye shes de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as anything other than the emptiness of its very own mark.🔽They do not see that wisdom as internal to the emptiness of not apprehending anything.

original: ye shes de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as external to the emptiness of not apprehending anything.🔽They do not see that wisdom as internal and external to the emptiness of not apprehending anything.

original: ye shes de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as anything other than the emptiness of not apprehending anything.

original: des ye shes de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ye shes de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as external to the emptiness of nonthings.🔽They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness of nonthings internally.

original: ye shes de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness of nonthings externally.

original: des ye shes de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de ngo bo nyid stong pa @36b nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de ngo bo nyid stong pa @36b nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽They do not see that wisdom as external to the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.

original: ye shes de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics internally.

original: ye shes de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than emptiness of essential nature.🔽I do not see that wisdom as the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: ye shes de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as outside the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.🔽I do not see that wisdom as inside and outside the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: ye shes de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: des ye shes de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as the applications of mindfulness.

original: ye shes de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as the applications of mindfulness externally.🔽He does not see that wisdom as the applications of mindfulness internally and externally.

original: ye shes de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the applications of mindfulness.🔽He does not see that wisdom as the right efforts internally.

original: ye shes de yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as the right efforts externally.🔽He does not see that wisdom as the right efforts internally and externally.

original: ye shes de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes @37a *//
analyzed: ye shes de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes @37a *//
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the right efforts.🔽He does not see that wisdom as the legs of miraculous power internally.

original: de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /

analyzed: ye shes de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: he does not see that wisdom as being outside the bases of miraculous powers,🔽he does not see that wisdom as being inside and outside the bases of miraculous powers,

analyzed: ye shes de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de dbang po rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and he does not see that wisdom as being other than the bases of miraculous powers.🔽“He does not see that wisdom as being in the faculties,

original: ye shes de dbang po rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de dbang po rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dbang po rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de dbang po rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: he does not see that wisdom as being outside the faculties,🔽he does not see that wisdom as being inside and outside the faculties,

original: ye shes de dbang po rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de dbang po rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: and he does not see that wisdom as being other than the faculties.

original: des ye shes de stobs rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de stobs rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being within the powers.

original: ye shes de stobs rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de stobs rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de stobs rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de stobs rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside the powers.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being inside and outside the powers.

original: ye shes de stobs rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de stobs rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than the powers.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being within the branches of enlightenment.

original: ye shes de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside the branches of enlightenment.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being inside and outside the branches of enlightenment.

original: ye shes de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than the branches of enlightenment.

original: des @37b ye shes de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des @37b ye shes de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /

translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than the eightfold noble path.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being within the noble truths.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being outside the noble truths.

original: ye shes de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside the noble truths.

original: ye shes de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom anywhere else apart from the noble truths.

original: des ye shes de bsam gtan rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de bsam gtan rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de bsam gtan rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de bsam gtan rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom within the meditative concentrations.🔽I do not see that wisdom outside the meditative concentrations.

original: ye shes de bsam gtan rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de bsam gtan rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom within and without the meditative concentrations.

original: ye shes de bsam gtan rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de tshad med pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de tshad med pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
