translated: I do not see that wisdom anywhere else apart from the meditative concentrations.🔽I do not see that wisdom within the immeasurable aspirations.🔽I do not see that wisdom outside the immeasurable aspirations.

original: ye shes de tshad med pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshad med pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom within and without the immeasurable aspirations.

original: ye shes de tshad med pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽@38a *// des ye shes de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de tshad med pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // @38a *// des ye shes de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as anything other than the immeasurables.🔽He does not see that wisdom as being within the formless absorptions.

original: ye shes de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being outside the formless absorptions.🔽He does not see that wisdom as being both within and outside the formless absorptions.

original: ye shes de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as anything other than the formless absorptions.🔽He does not see that wisdom as being within the eight aspects of liberation.

original: ye shes de rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as being outside the eight aspects of liberation.

original: ye shes de rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as the eight liberations, either internally or externally.

original: ye shes de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the eight liberations.🔽He does not see that wisdom as the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: ye shes de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: he does not see that wisdom as external to the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,🔽he does not see that wisdom as the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, either internally or externally,

original: ye shes de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: and he does not see that wisdom as other than the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: des ye shes de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa @38b dang smon pa med pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa @38b dang smon pa med pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.

original: ye shes de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as external to the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.🔽They do not see that wisdom as the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.

original: ye shes de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as anything other than the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.

original: des ye shes de mngon par shes pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de mngon par shes pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the superknowledges.

original: ye shes de mngon par shes pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de mngon par shes pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de mngon par shes pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de mngon par shes pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as external to the superknowledges.🔽He does not see that wisdom as both internal and external to the superknowledges.

original: ye shes de mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the superknowledges.🔽“He does not see that wisdom as internal to the meditative stabilizations.

original: ye shes de ting nge 'dzin rnam kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de ting nge 'dzin rnam kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as external to the meditative stabilizations.🔽He does not see that wisdom as both internal and external to the meditative stabilizations.

original: ye shes de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the meditative stabilizations.

original: des ye shes de gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “He does not see that wisdom as internal to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: ye shes de gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma @39a *//🔽mthong / ye shes de gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma @39a *// mthong / ye shes de gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as external to the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽He does not see that wisdom as both external and internal to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: ye shes de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽He does not see that wisdom as internal to the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as external to the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽He does not see that wisdom as both external and internal to the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that wisdom as other than the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: des ye shes de mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being within the fearlessnesses,

original: ye shes de mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: they do not see that wisdom as being outside the fearlessnesses,🔽they do not see that wisdom as being inside and outside the fearlessnesses,

original: ye shes de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and they do not see that wisdom as being other than the fearlessnesses.🔽“They do not see that wisdom as being within the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽they do not see that wisdom as being outside the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽they do not see that wisdom as being inside and outside the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and they do not see that wisdom as being other than the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags @39b pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags @39b pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not consider that wisdom to be anything other than the correct understandings.

original: des ye shes de snying rje chen po'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de snying rje chen po'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de snying rje chen po'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de snying rje chen po'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not consider that wisdom to be within great compassion.🔽I do not consider that wisdom to be outside great compassion.

original: ye shes de snying rje chen po'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de snying rje chen po'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not consider that wisdom to be inside and outside great compassion.

original: ye shes de snying rje chen po ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de snying rje chen po ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not consider that wisdom to be anything other than great compassion.🔽I do not consider that wisdom to be within the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not consider that wisdom to be outside the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as the distinct qualities of a buddha, either inside or outside.

original: ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as anything other than the distinct qualities of a buddha.🔽“He does not see that wisdom as the result of stream enterer.

original: ye shes de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that wisdom as the result of stream enterer, either inside or outside.🔽He does not see that wisdom as the result of stream enterer, either inside or outside.

original: ye shes de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that wisdom as anything other than the result of stream enterer.

original: des ye shes de lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “He does not see that wisdom as the result of once-returner.

original: ye shes de lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be external to the result of once-returner.

original: ye shes de lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par @40a *//🔽rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par @40a *// rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be internal to the result of once-returner.🔽He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be external and internal to the result of once-returner.

original: ye shes de lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be other than the result of once-returner.🔽“He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be internal to the result of nonreturner.

original: ye shes de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be external to the result of nonreturner.🔽He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be external and internal to the result of nonreturner.

original: ye shes de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not consider that pristine consciousness to be other than the result of nonreturner.

original: des ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being within the state of an arhat.

original: ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside the state of an arhat.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being both inside and outside the state of an arhat.

original: ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de rang byang chub kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de dgra bcom pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rang byang chub kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than the state of an arhat.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being within individual enlightenment.

original: ye shes de rang byang chub kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rang byang chub kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rang byang chub kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rang byang chub kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being outside individual enlightenment.🔽They do not see that wisdom as being both inside and outside individual enlightenment.

original: ye shes de rang byang chub ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de rang byang chub ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that wisdom as being other than individual enlightenment.

original: des ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that wisdom as the knowledge of path aspects,🔽they do not see that wisdom as external to the knowledge of path aspects,

original: @40b ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: @40b ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: they do not see that wisdom as both the knowledge of path aspects and external to it,

original: ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and they do not see that wisdom as anything other than the knowledge of path aspects.🔽“They do not see that wisdom as the knowledge of all aspects,🔽they do not see that wisdom as external to the knowledge of all aspects,🔽they do not see that wisdom as both the knowledge of all aspects and external to it,

original: ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and they do not see that wisdom as anything other than the knowledge of all aspects.

original: ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the knowledge of all aspects.

original: des ye shes de de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de de bzhin nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de de bzhin nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being in suchness.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being outside suchness.

original: ye shes de de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being inside and outside suchness.🔽I do not see that wisdom as anything other than suchness.

original: des ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽de ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / de ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being in unmistaken suchness.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being outside unmistaken suchness.

original: ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being inside and outside unmistaken suchness.

original: ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than unmistaken suchness.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being within non-otherness suchness.

original: ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang @41a *//🔽dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang @41a *// dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being outside non-otherness suchness.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside non-otherness suchness.

original: ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than non-otherness suchness.

original: des ye shes de chos nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de chos nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de chos nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being within the intrinsic nature.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being outside the intrinsic nature.

original: ye shes de chos nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chos nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside the intrinsic nature.

original: ye shes de chos nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chos nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the true nature of dharmas.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being within the realm of dharmas.

original: ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being outside the realm of dharmas.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside the realm of dharmas.

original: ye shes de chos kyi dbyings ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de chos kyi dbyings ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom as anything other than the realm of dharmas.

original: des ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: des ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being within the true nature of dharmas.🔽I do not see that wisdom as being outside the true nature of dharmas.

original: ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom as being both within and outside the true nature of dharmas.

original: ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de chos skyon med pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de chos skyon med pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de chos skyon med pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos skyon med pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom anywhere else apart from the reality of phenomena.🔽I do not see that wisdom within the faultlessness of phenomena.🔽I do not see that wisdom outside the faultlessness of phenomena.

original: ye @41b shes de chos skyon med pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye @41b shes de chos skyon med pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom within and without the faultlessness of phenomena.

original: ye shes de chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽des ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom anywhere else apart from the faultlessness of phenomena.🔽I do not see that wisdom within the limit of reality.🔽I do not see that wisdom outside the limit of reality.

original: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not see that wisdom within and without the limit of reality.

original: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see that wisdom anywhere else than in the limit of reality.

original: tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te /
analyzed: tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te /
translated: The wandering mendicant Maṇi­candrasya­guṇālaṃkāra­pratibhāna­śrī was inspired by this explanation.

original: de ltar mos par gyur nas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar mos par gyur nas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te /
translated: Having been inspired, he, through the power of faith, took the true nature of dharmas as his authority and entered into the wisdom of omniscience because he did not apprehend any dharmas.

original: de de ltar mos par gyur nas des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis te /
analyzed: de de ltar mos par gyur nas des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis te /
translated: Having been inspired in that way, he did not apprehend any dharma at all because he did not apprehend any dharma that was without signs and without mental placement.

original: chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis /🔽gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis / gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'am /
translated: Because all dharmas are not apprehended

original: gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des mi dmigs te /
translated: and are not given up, he did not apprehend any dharma at all that could be apprehended or given up.🔽“

original: chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni /
translated: Because of the absence of conceit in all phenomena,

original: mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so //
translated: even nirvana is not something to be conceited about.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis @42a *//
analyzed: de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis @42a *//
translated: in this way, because of the absence of grasping at all phenomena,

original: ba'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du shes yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: ba'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du shes yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: one does not grasp at form, does not grasp at feelings, does not grasp at perceptions, does not grasp at formations, and does not grasp at consciousness.

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mig yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mig yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: Because of the absence of grasping at all phenomena, one does not grasp at the eyes, does not grasp at the ears, does not grasp at the nose, does not grasp at the tongue, does not grasp at the body,

original: yid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sgra yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dri yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ro yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽reg yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: yid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sgra yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dri yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ro yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / reg yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at form because of not grasping at the mind and because of not grasping at all phenomena. It is to not grasp at sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental phenomena.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at the eye consciousness, ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, or mind consciousness because of not grasping at the mind and because of not grasping at all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i @42b 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i @42b 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: Because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp the contact that is the coming together of the eye,🔽they do not grasp the contact that is the coming together of the ear, they do not grasp the contact that is the coming together of the nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: they do not grasp the contact that is the coming together of the tongue, they do not grasp the contact that is the coming together of the body, they do not grasp the contact that is the coming together of the mind, and because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the eye,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du sa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du sa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: They do not grasp feelings that arise from the condition of contact through the union of the eye, and they do not grasp feelings that arise from the condition of contact through the union of the ear, the nose, the tongue, the body, or the mind.🔽Because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp the earth element,

original: chu'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / me'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rlung gi khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chu'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / me'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rlung gi khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: they do not grasp the water element, they do not grasp the fire element, they do not grasp the wind element, they do not grasp the space element, and they do not grasp the consciousness element.

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ma rig pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽skye mched drug yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / reg pa yongs @43a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ma rig pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye mched drug yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / reg pa yongs @43a *//
translated: Because all phenomena are ungraspable, ignorance is ungraspable, formations are ungraspable, consciousness is ungraspable, name and form are ungraspable,

original: su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / len pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / len pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: the six sense sources are ungraspable, contact is ungraspable, sensation is ungraspable, craving is ungraspable, grasping is ungraspable, becoming is ungraspable, birth is ungraspable,

original: rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: and aging and death are ungraspable. Because all phenomena are ungraspable, the perfection of generosity is ungraspable, the perfection of discipline is ungraspable,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, or the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong ba nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chen po stong ba nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: they do not fully grasp the emptiness of the unconditioned,🔽they do not fully grasp the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽they do not fully grasp the emptiness of what is without beginning or end,🔽they do not fully grasp the emptiness of what is not to be discarded,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / @43b rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / @43b rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: they do not fully grasp the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽they do not fully grasp the emptiness of all things,🔽they do not fully grasp the emptiness of defining characteristics,🔽they do not fully grasp the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: they do not fully grasp the emptiness of non-entities,🔽and they do not fully grasp the emptiness of essential nature.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du rang byang chub yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
