translated: because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp the result of non-return; because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp the state of a worthy one; because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp individual enlightenment;

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp the knowledge of path aspects; and because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp the knowledge of all aspects.

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ma nor ba @45a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ma nor ba @45a *//
translated: Because all phenomena are ungraspable, suchness is ungraspable.🔽Because all phenomena are ungraspable, unmistaken suchness is ungraspable.🔽Because all phenomena are ungraspable, unaltered suchness is ungraspable.

original: de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang; chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang; chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: Because all phenomena are ungraspable, the true nature of phenomena is ungraspable.

original: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos kyi gnas nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos skyon med pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos kyi gnas nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos skyon med pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni /
translated: Because all phenomena are ungraspable, the maturity of phenomena is ungraspable.🔽Because all phenomena are ungraspable, the limit of reality is ungraspable.

original: pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas /
analyzed: pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas /
translated: This is the perfection of the other shore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o ////
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o ////
translated: the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa /
analyzed: bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa /
translated: Chapter XXVII

original: 'on kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /
translated: But until his aspirations are fulfilled, he will not pass into parinirvāṇa.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The four establishments of mindfulness are not fulfilled.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The four right efforts are not fulfilled.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /🔽dbang po lnga yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs / dbang po lnga yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The four legs of magical emanation are not fulfilled.🔽The five faculties are not fulfilled.

original: stobs lnga yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: stobs lnga yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The five powers are not fulfilled.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The seven branches of enlightenment are not fulfilled.

original: @45b 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: @45b 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The noble eightfold path is not fulfilled.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The four noble truths are not fulfilled.

original: bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The four concentrations are not fulfilled.

original: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The four immeasurables are not fulfilled.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The four formless absorptions are not fulfilled.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The eight liberations are not fulfilled.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The nine serial absorptions are not fulfilled.

original: rnam par thar pa sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: and the liberation gate of wishlessness are incomplete,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: the superknowledges are incomplete,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: the meditative stabilizations are incomplete,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are incomplete,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas are incomplete,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: the four fearlessnesses are incomplete,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /🔽byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs / byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges are incomplete,🔽great love is incomplete,

original: snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: great compassion is incomplete,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are incomplete, they do not pass into nirvāṇa in the interval.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar smon lam rnams ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar smon lam rnams ni /
translated: It is because aspirations

original: smon lam ma lags /
analyzed: smon lam ma lags /
translated: are not aspirations,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni /
translated: the applications of mindfulness

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma lags /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams ni /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma lags / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are not the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba ma lags /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba ma lags / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni /
translated: the right efforts are not the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ma lags /🔽dbang po rnams ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ma lags / dbang po rnams ni /
translated: the legs of miraculous power are not the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po ma lags /🔽stobs rnams ni /
analyzed: dbang po ma lags / stobs rnams ni /
translated: the faculties are not the faculties,

original: stobs ma lags /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag @46a *//
analyzed: stobs ma lags / byang chub kyi yan lag @46a *//
translated: the powers are not the powers,

original: rnams ni / byang chub kyi yan lag ma lags /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
analyzed: rnams ni / byang chub kyi yan lag ma lags / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
translated: the branches of awakening are not the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni /
translated: the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa ma lags /🔽bsam gtan rnams ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa ma lags / bsam gtan rnams ni /
translated: the noble truths are not the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan ma lags /🔽tshad med pa rnams ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan ma lags / tshad med pa rnams ni /
translated: the meditative stabilities are not the meditative stabilities,

original: tshad med pa ma lags /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa ma lags / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni /
translated: the immeasurables are not the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags /🔽rnam par thar pa rnams ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags / rnam par thar pa rnams ni /
translated: the formless absorptions are not the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa ma lags /
translated: the deliverances are not the deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags /
translated: The nine serial absorptions are not the serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ni /
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are not

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma lags /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma lags / mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.🔽The clairvoyances are not

original: mngon par shes pa ma lags /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa ma lags / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni /
translated: the clairvoyances.🔽The meditative stabilizations are not

original: ting nge 'dzin ma lags /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ma lags / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni /
translated: the meditative stabilizations.🔽The dhāraṇī gateways are not

original: gzungs kyi sgo ma lags /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo ma lags / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas are not

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ma lags /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ma lags / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas.🔽The fearlessnesses are not

original: mi 'jigs pa ma lags /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa ma lags / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni /
translated: the fearlessnesses.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges are not

original: so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags /🔽byams pa chen po ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags / byams pa chen po ni /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽Great love is not🔽great love.🔽Great compassion is not

original: byams pa chen po ma lags /🔽snying rje chen po ni /
analyzed: byams pa chen po ma lags /🔽snying rje chen po ni /
translated: great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po ma lags /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma lags /
translated: It is not great compassion.

original: sangs @46b rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
analyzed: sangs @46b rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
translated: The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lags te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lags te /
translated: are not the qualities of the buddhas.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They are

original: chos kyang ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyang ma lags /
translated: not phenomena,

original: chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags so //
analyzed: chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags so //
translated: nor are they not phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ltar chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du shes yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ltar chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du shes yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: Blessed One,🔽in this way, because all phenomena are not grasped at, form is not grasped at, feeling is not grasped at, perception is not grasped at, formation is not grasped at, and consciousness is not grasped at.

original: chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du mig yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du mig yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: Because all phenomena are not grasped at, the eyes are not grasped at, the ears are not grasped at, the nose is not grasped at, the tongue is not grasped at, the body is not grasped at, and the mind is not grasped at.

original: yid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sgra yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dri yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ro yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽reg yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: yid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sgra yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dri yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ro yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / reg yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at form, to not grasp at sound, to not grasp at smell, to not grasp at taste, to not grasp at texture, and to not grasp at mental phenomena.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at the eye consciousness, to not grasp at the ear consciousness, to not grasp at the nose consciousness, to not grasp at the tongue consciousness, to not grasp at the body consciousness, and to not grasp at the mind consciousness.

original: chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna @47a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna @47a *//
translated: Because all phenomena are not appropriated, they do not appropriate the visual sense field,

original: ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: they do not appropriate the auditory sense field, they do not appropriate the olfactory sense field, they do not appropriate the gustatory sense field, they do not appropriate the tactile sense field,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: and they do not appropriate the mental sense field. Because all phenomena are not appropriated, they do not appropriate the feeling that arises from the condition of visual contact, they do not appropriate the feeling that arises from the condition of auditory contact,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du sa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chu'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / me'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du sa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chu'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / me'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: They do not grasp feelings that arise from the condition of the union of the nose and a smell,🔽they do not grasp feelings that arise from the condition of the union of the tongue and a taste, they do not grasp feelings that arise from the condition of the union of the body and a tangible object, and they do not grasp feelings that arise from the condition of the union of the mind and a dharma.🔽“Because all phenomena are ungrasped, they do not grasp the earth element, they do not grasp the water element, they do not grasp the fire element,

original: rlung gi khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du ma rig pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: rlung gi khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du ma rig pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: they do not grasp the wind element, they do not grasp the space element, they do not grasp the consciousness element, and because all phenomena are ungrasped, they do not grasp ignorance,

original: 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye mched @47b drug yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye mched @47b drug yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: They do not grasp the formative predispositions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense fields, contact,

original: tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / len pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / len pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and aging and death.

original: chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: Because all phenomena are ungraspable, they do not grasp the transcendent perfection of generosity, they do not grasp the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, they do not grasp the transcendent perfection of tolerance,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: It is because they do not appropriate the perfection of generosity,🔽the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom, and because they do not appropriate all dharmas, that they do not appropriate inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, the great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi @48a *//
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi @48a *//
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless,

original: 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of non-repudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, and the emptiness of the nonexistence of things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of essential nature, and they do not apprehend the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities. Because all phenomena are not apprehended, they do not apprehend the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dbang po rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / stobs rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dbang po rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / stobs rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: they do not apprehend the right efforts, they do not apprehend the legs of miraculous power, they do not apprehend the faculties, they do not apprehend the powers, they do not apprehend the branches of awakening, and they do not apprehend the path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: It is to not grasp at the noble truths because all phenomena are not grasped at. It is to not grasp at the meditative concentrations, not grasp at the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: not grasp at the formless meditative stabilities, not grasp at the eight aspects of liberation, not grasp at the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, and not grasp at the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mngon @48b par shes pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /🔽chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mngon @48b par shes pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: They do not grasp at the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of non-disintegration, the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-entities, the emptiness of all things, and the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They do not grasp at the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, the great love, the great compassion, or the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: byams pa chen po yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: byams pa chen po yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: They do not grasp at the result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, or unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang byang chub yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / rang byang chub yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: it is not to fully grasp the knowledge of path aspects,🔽it is not to fully grasp the knowledge of all aspects,🔽it is not to fully grasp suchness because all dharmas are not fully grasped,🔽it is not to fully grasp unaltered suchness,🔽it is not to fully grasp unmistaken suchness,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: it is not to fully grasp the true nature of dharmas,🔽it is not to fully grasp the dharma-constituent,🔽it is not to fully grasp the dharma-element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unthinkable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the reality limit,🔽it is not to fully grasp the inconceivable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unmoving element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unattached element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unextinguished element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unobscured element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unconditioned element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unarisen element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unoriginated element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unmanifest element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element,🔽it is not to fully grasp the unapprehendable element

original: chos nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin @49a *//🔽pa 'di ni /
analyzed: chos nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin @49a *// pa 'di ni /
translated: not apprehending the real nature, not apprehending the dharma-constituent, not apprehending the establishment of dharmas, not apprehending the certification of dharmas, and not apprehending the very limit of reality,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom investigate like this, ‘What is the perfection of wisdom?🔽What is this perfection of wisdom?

original: gang gi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni; ci zhig /
analyzed: gang gi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni; ci zhig /
translated: What is this perfection of wisdom?

original: ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par ni bgyi ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par ni bgyi ste /
translated: Why is it called the perfection of wisdom?’

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na /
translated: If, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they practice thinking, “Is it the perfection of wisdom that does not exist and is not apprehended?”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin /
analyzed: chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin /
translated: what are the dharmas that do not exist and are not apprehended?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong @49b pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong @49b pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽Because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of external phenomena, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of emptiness, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of great extent, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of ultimate reality, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of the unlimited, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of non-dispersal, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of inherent existence, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of all phenomena, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽Because of the emptiness of non-apprehension, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of non-entities, the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and non-apprehensible

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is non-existent and non-apprehensible;🔽the transcendent perfection of perseverance is non-existent and non-apprehensible;

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the transcendent perfection of tolerance is non-existent and non-apprehensible;

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is non-existent and non-apprehensible;

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the transcendent perfection of generosity is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so //🔽tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so // tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is non-existent and non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of essential nature.🔽Feeling is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: 'du shes med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Perception is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: 'du byed med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Formation is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i @50a *//
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i @50a *//
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bu; nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bu; nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Son of noble family, the eyes are not existent and are not found because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽The ears are not existent and are not found because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose is not existent and is not found because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽The tongue is not existent and is not found because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: rna ba med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the

original: sna med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the nose does not exist and is not found,

original: lce med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the tongue does not exist and is not found,

original: lus med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus med cing mi dmigs so //

analyzed: yid med cing mi dmigs so //

translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,🔽the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽unconditioned emptiness, emptiness of the unlimited, emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, emptiness of non-dispersal, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of all phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: and

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos @50b po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, form is not existent and is not found.

analyzed: sgra med cing mi dmigs so // dri med cing mi dmigs so // ro med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Sound is not existent and is not found.🔽Smell is not existent and is not found.🔽Taste is not existent and is not found.

original: reg med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Tactile objects are not existent and are not found.

original: chos med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Mental objects are not existent and are not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /

translated: because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

translated: because of the emptiness of what transcends limits, the emptiness of no beginning and no end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //

translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, the eye consciousness does not exist and is not found.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so // sna'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ear consciousness does not exist and is not found.🔽The nose consciousness does not exist and is not found.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue consciousness does not exist and is not found.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //

translated: The body consciousness does not exist and is not found.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind consciousness does not exist and is not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang @51a *//

translated: the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,🔽and the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of the non-existence of things, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of essential nature of non-existence, the eye constituent is non-existent and not found,

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the ear constituent is non-existent and not found,🔽the nose constituent is non-existent and not found,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the tongue constituent is non-existent and not found,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the body constituent is non-existent and not found,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the thinking-mind constituent is non-existent and not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i @51b rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //

translated: Because of this, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the eye is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear is non-existent and non-apprehensible.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of body is non-existent and is not apprehended,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
