translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The earth element is not existent and is not found because of the emptiness of its own mark, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of its own nature, and the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

original: chu'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chu'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The water element is not existent and is not found.

original: me'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //🔽rlung gi khams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: me'i khams med cing mi dmigs so // rlung gi khams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The fire element is not existent and is not found.🔽The wind element is not existent and is not found.

original: nam mkha'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The space element is not existent and is not found.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The consciousness element is not existent and is not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang @52a *//
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang @52a *//
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, and the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena are not existent and are not found.

original: stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness, the great emptiness, the ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-observation,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma rig pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma rig pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of the non-existence of things, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.🔽Because of this, ignorance does not exist and is not observed.

original: 'du byed med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Formations do not exist and are not observed.

original: rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness does not exist and is not observed.

original: ming dang gzugs med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: name and form do not exist and are not found;

original: skye mched drug med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched drug med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the six sense fields do not exist and are not found;

original: reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: contact does not exist and is not found;

original: tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //🔽sred pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so // sred pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: feeling does not exist and is not found;🔽craving does not exist and is not found;

original: len pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: len pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: grasping does not exist and is not found;

original: srid pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: srid pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: becoming does not exist and is not found;

original: skye ba med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye ba med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: birth does not exist and is not found;

original: rga shi med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rga shi med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and old age and death do not exist and are not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / @52b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / @52b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The perfection of giving is not found and is not apprehended because of the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what transcends limits, the emptiness of no beginning or end, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of morality is not found and is not apprehended.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of patience is not found and is not apprehended.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of effort is not found and is not apprehended.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability is non-existent and cannot be apprehended,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is non-existent and cannot be apprehended,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: unconditioned emptiness, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginning and end, the emptiness of non-discarded phenomena, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the applications of mindfulness do not exist and are not found.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The right efforts do not exist and are not found.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med cing @53a *//🔽mi dmigs so //🔽dbang po rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med cing @53a *// mi dmigs so // dbang po rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The legs of miraculous power do not exist and are not found.🔽The faculties do not exist and are not found.

original: stobs rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stobs rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers do not exist and are not found.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The branches of awakening do not exist and are not found.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The noble eightfold path does not exist and is not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽Because of this emptiness, the noble truths do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: bsam gtan rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the meditative stabilities are not and are not apprehended,

original: tshad med pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the immeasurable aspirations are not and are not apprehended,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the formless absorptions are not and are not apprehended,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the eight aspects of liberation are not and are not apprehended,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are not and are not apprehended,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness aspect of liberation, the absence of attributes aspect of liberation, and the absence of expectancy aspect of liberation are not and are not apprehended,🔽the five eyes are not and are not apprehended,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams med cing mi @53b dmigs so //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams med cing mi @53b dmigs so // ting nge 'dzin rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the six superknowledges are not and are not apprehended,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are not and are not apprehended,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not and are not apprehended,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the four fearlessnesses are not and are not apprehended,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges are not and are not apprehended,

original: byams pa chen po med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byams pa chen po med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: great love is not and is not apprehended,

original: snying rje chen po med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: great compassion does not exist and is not found.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas do not exist and are not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: unconditioned emptiness, the emptiness of beyond extremes, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of defining attributes, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The result of once-returner does not exist and is not found.🔽The result of non-returner does not exist and is not found.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so; ;dgra bcom pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so; ;dgra bcom pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Arhatship does not exist and is not found.

original: rang byang chub med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang byang chub med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Solitary buddhahood does not exist and is not found.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects does not exist and is not found.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs @54a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs @54a *//
translated: The knowledge of all aspects does not exist and is not found.

original: so; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: so; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽Because of the emptiness of essential nature, suchness does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nonerroneous suchness does not exist and is not found.

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nonother suchness does not exist and is not found.

original: chos nyid med cing mi dmigs so //🔽chos kyi dbyings med cing mi dmigs so //🔽chos kyi gnas nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos nyid med cing mi dmigs so // chos kyi dbyings med cing mi dmigs so // chos kyi gnas nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature does not exist and is not found.🔽The dharma-constituent does not exist and is not found.🔽The establishment of dharmas does not exist and is not found.

original: chos skyon med pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The certification of dharmas does not exist and is not found.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The very limit of reality does not exist and is not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / @54b rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / @54b rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽Because of this, the stream enterer does not exist and is not found.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'ang med cing mi dmigs so //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'ang med cing mi dmigs so // phyir mi 'ong ba'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The once-returner does not exist and is not found.🔽The non-returner does not exist and is not found.

original: dgra bcom pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The arhat does not exist and is not found.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The pratyekabuddha does not exist and is not found.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva does not exist and is not found.

original: sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: a buddha is not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena is not apprehended because the emptiness of internal phenomena is not discerned.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of external phenomena is not apprehended because the emptiness of external phenomena is not discerned.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is not apprehended because the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is not discerned.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not apprehended because the emptiness of emptiness is not discerned.

original: chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of great extent is not apprehended because the emptiness of great extent is not discerned.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is not apprehended because the emptiness of ultimate reality is not discerned.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is not apprehended because the emptiness of the conditioned is non-apprehensible.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med cing mi @55a *//🔽dmigs so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med cing mi @55a *// dmigs so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not apprehended because the emptiness of the unconditioned is non-apprehensible.🔽The emptiness of what transcends limits is not apprehended because the emptiness of what transcends limits is non-apprehensible.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of no beginning and no end is not apprehended because the emptiness of no beginning and no end is non-apprehensible.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so; ;rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so; ;rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection is not apprehended because the emptiness of non-rejection is non-apprehensible. The emptiness of a basic nature is not apprehended because the emptiness of a basic nature is non-apprehensible.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not apprehended because all phenomena are unapprehendable.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is not apprehended because defining characteristics are unapprehendable.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of nonobservation is not apprehended because nonobservation is unapprehendable.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings is not apprehended because nonthings are unapprehendable.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is not apprehended because essential nature is unapprehendable.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings is not apprehended because the essential nature of nonthings is unapprehendable.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med @55b cing yongs su zhum pa med la /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med @55b cing yongs su zhum pa med la /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra, if great bodhisattva beings, when they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, reflect and contemplate in this way, and when they reflect and contemplate in this way, their minds are not cowed, nor do they feel fainthearted,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur na /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o // smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor; ci'i phyir na /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya /🔽rab 'byor gyis smras pa /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: form is devoid of the intrinsic nature of form,

translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of non-entities,🔽and the emptiness of essential nature.

original: pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: “What is the emptiness of internal phenomena?🔽It is the emptiness of the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.🔽“What is the emptiness of external phenomena?🔽It is the emptiness of forms, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni /
translated: “What is the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena?🔽It is the emptiness of the eyes and so on up to and including the emptiness of the mind, and the emptiness of forms and so on up to and including the emptiness of mental phenomena.🔽“What is the emptiness of emptiness?🔽It is the emptiness of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽“What is the emptiness of great extent?🔽It is the emptiness of the worlds of desire, form, and formlessness.🔽“What is the emptiness of ultimate reality?🔽It is the emptiness of nirvāṇa.🔽“What is the emptiness of conditioned phenomena?🔽It is the emptiness of the five perpetuating aggregates.🔽“What is the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /🔽de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: It is the emptiness of space, the emptiness of the absence of discernment, the emptiness of cessation, and the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽“What is the emptiness of the unlimited?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
translated: It is the emptiness of the unlimited world systems in the ten directions.🔽“What is the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end?🔽It is the emptiness of past, present, and future phenomena.🔽“What is the emptiness of non-dispersal?🔽It is the emptiness of the three times.🔽“What is the emptiness of inherent existence?

original: mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
translated: It is the emptiness of the inherent existence of all phenomena.🔽“What is the emptiness of all things?🔽It is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽“What is the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics
